title: Carol Kidd - The Night We Called It a Day (1990) RESEED
description:
MP3/256Kbps

Recorded at Castle Sound Studios, Edinburgh, 12 & 13 February, 1990
Produced by Elliot Meadow
Recording Engineer - Calum Malcolm
Carol Kidd - vocal
David Newton - piano
Dave Green - bass
Allan Ganley - drums

Tracks:
1. How Little We Know
2. Where or When
3. I Fall In Love Too Easily
4. I Loved Him
5. The Night We Called It A Day
6. Where Are You
7. The Glory of Love
8. I Could Have Told You So
9. I Think It&#039;s Gonna Rain Today
10. Gloomy Sunday
